translations: v．剥夺，使失去（财产、权利等）：指通过法律或强制手段，使某人失去对财产、土地或其他权利的拥有。

sentences.sentence: Thus we will take possession of all that Jehovah our God dispossesses for our sake.
sentences.translation: 耶和华我们的神为我们的缘故所赶出之人的一切地，我们就要得为业。

sentences.sentence: Once I produce, once I write, it is the Text itself which dispossesses me of my narrative continuity.
sentences.translation: 每当我在创作，在写作时，正是文本本身剥夺了我的叙述连贯性。
